Treats

Curry Salad Dressing

Notes

Also works as a really nice marinade for kebabs, just sayin’

What's in it
  • 2/3 cups olive oil
  • 1/4 cup maple syrup
  • 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar
  • 1 tsp cumin
  • 1 1/2 tbsps curry powder
  • 2 tsp dijon mustard
  • 1/2 tsp of salt
What to do
  • Combine everything and blend until smooth and emulsified
